articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
Circle to unwind certain Silvergate services…

Circle: 1/ We maintain relationships with several banking partners. We are sensitive to the concerns around Silvergate and are in the process of unwinding certain services with them and notifying customers. Otherwise, all Circle services, including USDC are operating as normal.
articles.title: Circle to unwind certain Silvergate services…

Coinbase Assets: We regularly monitor the assets on our exchange to ensure they meet our listing standards. Based on our most recent reviews, Coinbase will suspend trading for Binance USD (BUSD) on March 13, 2023, on or around 12pm ET.
